DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate train pelvic floor muscle , associate individualize treatment progress group treatment , would effective individualized training group . Methods : Randomized control study do January December 2016 , Laboratory Women 's Health Research , Federal University São Carlos-SP , Brazil . Inclusion criterion : woman stress UI , old 18 year old . The sample size calculation perform use GPower Software ( 3.1.5 , Germany ) estimate sample 30 woman group . The volunteer assess intervention urinary symptom evaluation form , King 's Health Questionnaire , miccional diary , PERFECT scheme perineometry . After evaluation perform randomization volunteer blind investigator volunteer allocate three group : Group 1 : Individualized Training Group 2 : Individualized train progression group train Group 3 : Group train For group use protocol prepare accord recommendation American College Sports Medicine . Later , volunteer reassess 12 treatment , three month six month ( discharge date ) . It add reassessment Self-efficacy Scale Pelvic Floor Exercises Practice . Primary outcome : severity measure King 's Health Questionnaire . Secondary outcome : miccional diary , PERFECT scheme , perineometry Self-efficacy scale Pelvic Floor Exercises Practice . Data normality test Shapiro-Wilk test ( SPSS 19.0 ) . The comparison evaluation perform ANOVA , comparison group perform Student t-test ( independent measure ) . In order measure practical significance data , effect size confidence interval ( CI ) calculate . A 5 % significance level assume . This study approve Research Ethics Committee Federal University São Carlos , São Carlos- SP , Brazil ( Protocol 1207393 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Individual Pelvic Floor Muscle Training Versus Individual With Group Versus Group Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: This blind randomize controlled clinical trial . Data collection perform Women 's Health research laboratory ( WHRL ) , allocate Department Physical Therapy Federal University São Carlos , January 2016 December 2016 . The project approve Research Ethics Committee ( REC ) Federal University São Carlos ( UFSCar ) ( Number 1207393 ) . Patients receive information research consent participate , sign free inform consent form . The sample size calculation perform use GPower Software ( 3.1.5 , Germany ) base study Pereira et al ( 2011 ) consider intergroup comparison data post treatment severity measurement King 's Health Questionnaire . It consider ANOVA ( repeat measure ) , 80 % power , effect size 0.40 5 % significance level , estimate sample size 30 subject .
DOC.criteria: woman age 18 year old present urinary incontinence stress urge urinary incontinence ( UUI ) isolate form , neuromuscular disease , disease ( asthma , tumor , heart failure , absence pelvic floor muscle contraction ( grade 0 ) verify modify Oxford scale , urinary infection , difficulty understand study procedure , uncontrolled hypertension , presence severe prolapse ( visible prolapse vaginal opening ) , woman UI do physical therapy last 12 month , pregnancy , puerperium .
